name: Desserts
description: A knowledge graph about various desserts including ice cream, puddings, pastries, and frozen treats with their ingredients and preparation methods

nodes.label: Desserts
nodes.description: Sweet course typically served at the end of a meal

nodes.label: Ice Cream
nodes.description: Frozen dessert made from cream, sugar, and flavorings

nodes.label: Vanilla Ice Cream
nodes.description: Classic ice cream flavored with vanilla

nodes.label: Chocolate Ice Cream
nodes.description: Rich ice cream made with cocoa or chocolate

nodes.label: Strawberry Ice Cream
nodes.description: Ice cream made with fresh strawberries

nodes.label: Pudding
nodes.description: Creamy dessert typically made with milk, sugar, and a thickening agent

nodes.label: Chocolate Pudding
nodes.description: Smooth chocolate-flavored pudding

nodes.label: Vanilla Pudding
nodes.description: Classic vanilla-flavored pudding

nodes.label: Tiramisu
nodes.description: Italian dessert made of coffee-soaked ladyfingers layered with mascarpone

nodes.label: Gelato
nodes.description: Italian-style ice cream with a denser, more intense flavor

nodes.label: Sorbet
nodes.description: Frozen dessert made from fruit puree, sugar, and water without dairy

nodes.label: Panna Cotta
nodes.description: Italian dessert of sweetened cream thickened with gelatin

nodes.label: Cream
nodes.description: High-fat dairy product used in many desserts

nodes.label: Sugar
nodes.description: Sweet crystalline substance used to sweeten desserts

nodes.label: Milk
nodes.description: Dairy liquid used as a base for many desserts

nodes.label: Vanilla Extract
nodes.description: Flavoring extracted from vanilla beans

nodes.label: Cocoa
nodes.description: Chocolate powder used in chocolate desserts

nodes.label: Strawberries
nodes.description: Fresh fruit used in various desserts

nodes.label: Freezing
nodes.description: Chilling method used to solidify frozen desserts

nodes.label: Chilling
nodes.description: Refrigeration method used to set many desserts

nodes.label: Italian Cuisine
nodes.description: Traditional cooking style originating from Italy
